trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> class stores sort criteria for use by sort controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> 클래스는 정렬 컨트롤에서 사용할 정렬 조건을 저장합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.#ctor" /> constructor creates and initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.#ctor" /> 생성자는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.#ctor" /> constructor creates and initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.#ctor" /> 생성자는 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to use as a sort key.
The object identifier (OID) of the matching rule for the sort.
trans-unit.target: 정렬에 대한 일치하는 규칙의 OID(Object Identifier)입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the sort is ordered from the lowest to highest or <see langword="false" /> if the sort order is from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 정렬 순서가 오름차순이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 정렬 순서가 내림차순이면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> constructor creates and initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> class using the specified attribute name, matching rule, and sort order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 생성자는 지정된 특성 이름, 일치하는 규칙 및 정렬 순서를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.AttributeName" /> property specifies the name of the attribute to use as a sort key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.AttributeName" /> 속성은 정렬 키로 사용할 특성의 이름을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to use as a sort key.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.MatchingRule" /> property specifies the object identifier (OID) of the matching rule for the sort.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.MatchingRule" /> 속성은 정렬에 대한 일치하는 규칙의 OID(Object Identifier)를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OID of the matching rule for the sort.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.ReverseOrder" /> property specifies if the sort should be returned in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SortKey.ReverseOrder" /> 속성은 정렬이 역순으로 반환될지 여부를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if the sort is ordered from the lowest to highest or <see langword="false" /> if the sort is ordered from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 정렬 순서가 오름차순이면 <see langword="true" />이고 정렬 순서가 내림차순이면 <see langword="false" />입니다.
